data.message: How do I change my name on facebook? I changed it once ever because they said I had to,now whenever I try to do it it says I changed it 'too many times'.

replies.message: Hi, Joe. We require everyone to provide their real names, so you always know who you're connecting with and we keep our community safe. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2l92C1D. If you're having trouble changing your name, please let us know: http://bit.ly/2kbM6cR.  Keep in mind, you can only change your name every 60 days. -Rhea
I haven't changed it in years so no problem with the 60 day thing.
